about_the_game:
Wacky West is a high-octane, post-apocalyptic survival game set in the scorched Arizona desert after a nuclear catastrophe. Play as a resourceful survivalist battling hordes of mutants and zombies while scavenging the wasteland to upgrade your underground hideout and craft powerful weapons. In this action-packed, wild-west themed world, every run is a fight for survival as you dodge hazards, face menacing bosses, and gather crucial materials.

Key Features:


  • Wild Weapon Crafting: Create and upgrade an arsenal of unique weapons, from auto-targeting machine guns to rocket launchers and flamethrowers.
  • Wasteland Scavenging: Collect junk, scrap, and salvageable materials to craft tools, build weapons, and upgrade your base.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Encounter chaotic bosses like grenade-launching mutants and rocket-firing barricades that will test your survival skills.
  • Hazards & Perks: Navigate dangerous traps like barbed wire and corrosive puddles while grabbing useful pickups like Scrap Packs and Adrenaline Shots for an extra boost.
  • Endless Mode: After defeating the final boss, choose to continue the madness in endless mode for greater challenges and double the rewards.
  • Progressive Upgrades: Improve your gear and unlock new weapons and add-ons as you progress through multiple runs using the resources you’ve collected.
  • Unique Combat System: Smash loot crates with your melee attack to claim powerful items and engage in the one-of-three loot system after each boss for valuable upgrades.

In Wacky West, it’s all about crafting, scavenging, and surviving the wildest apocalypse imaginable!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 SUPER
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6GB GDDR6
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Wacky West brings the action you’ve always wanted from those endless runner fake mobile ads, but this time it’s the real thing! Dive into a fast-paced, post-apocalyptic world, fight off mutants, create sick combo builds, craft weapons, and survive the wasteland.
